## CryptoAlgorithm.keyUsages property

Indicates which cryptographic operations are permissible to be used with this algorithm.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract readonly keyUsages: Web5Crypto.KeyUsage[] | Web5Crypto.KeyPairUsage;
```
